text: Carole Samaha () is a Lebanese singer, actress, and performer. She has released six studio albums. Samaha has a master's degree in acting and directing, which she earned in 1999 from the Saint Joseph University of Beirut.Carole Samaha MSN Arabia, 4 April 2007 In 2004 she won the Arab Music Award for best female newcomer. She has also won multiple Murex d'Or awards and was nominated for best Arabia New Act in the MTV Europe Music Awards 2008. ==Early life== Samaha was born on 25 July 1972 in Beirut to Antoine Samaha from Khenchara, Matn and Nouhad Hawi from Dhour El Choueir, Matn. She has two brothers. Her parents supported different political factions, according to Samaha that fact made her become "more open" to the different views of people and she learned a lot from that experience. ==Personal life== On 1 November 2013, Samaha married Walid Mostafa, a divorced Egyptian with a daughter from a previous marriage, in a civil ceremony in Cyprus following an 18-month love affair and short engagement. On 31 August 2015 Carole Samaha gave birth to a baby girl, Tala.Welcome to the world our precious Angel Carole Samaha on Twitter«كارول سماحة تستقبل مولودتها الجديدة «تالا بوابة فيتو (Vetogate) She is Catholic. From 2014, Samaha has been residing in Egypt with her husband. == Discography== Year Album Translation Translation 2003 حلم A Dream اغنية الطفولة Children Songs 2004 انا حرة I'm Free 2006 أضواء الشهرة Lights of Fame 2009 حدودي السما The Sky Is My Limit 2013 إحساس A Feeling 2016 ذكرياتي Memories ==Videography== Year Song Album Lebanese Charts Egyptian Charts Translation Notes 2003 Oughniat El Toufoula Oughniat El Toufoula Childhood Songs Habib Alby Helm 3 1 My Love first release apart from the Rahbani 2004 Etalaa Feyi 1 4 Look At Me casting Mister Lebanon 1997 Ghassan El Mawla 2005 Ghali Alayi Ana Horra 1 3 You Mean A Lot To Me Nezlet El Sitara 48 32 The Curtain Fell Habbeit Delwa't 28 2 Now that i loved movie soundtrack 2006 Esmaani Adwa' Al Shohra 1 19 Listen to me Zaelni Mennak 1 18 I'm upset with you 2007 Adwa'a El Shohra 13 78 Lights of Fame sponsored by Pepsi Ya Rabi Ana wlleil - Marwan Khoury 1 3 Oh God ft.
